Introduction

Kevin Woo, better known as Kevin, is a Korean-American singer, actor, and MC, signed with FC ENM. He used to be part of the boy bands XING and U-KISS.

On October 25, 2018, he launched his solo career in Japan with the song “Ride Along”. He later debuted as a solo artist in the U.S. on June 29, 2021, with the track “Got It”. He also joined the Broadway musical KPOP as Jun Hyuk, a role in the imaginary boy band F8, on April 4, 2022.
